title: dipstaging Document Schema
description: dipstaging documents are generated for every AIP in the legacy preservation platform. They imply the availability of an AIP for import into the access platform.

slug.description: Access slug chosen when DIP is smelted

repos.description: array of repositories which has this AIP

reposManifestDate.description: date on the AIP manifest. Used to detect when the AIP has been updated, so this date should be stored with any processing.

reposDate.description: date when the above two fields were filled in.

METSManifestDate.description: date on the AIP manifest when this field was filled in

METSDate.description: date when the above two fields were filled in.

updated.description: date when this document was last updated

allOf.description: Trigger for and result of running Smelter on this AIP
